column3: Traffic;Sihanoukville: A Chinese man died at the scene of an accident in Sihanoukville at 1:10 am on March 1
column4: 2019.------His HIGHLANDER hit a road barrier divider ahead of the City Autonomous Port Sihanouk.------The car
column5: Phnom Penh 2AL-9729 driven by the unidentified Chinese male came from the west and overturned
column6: killing the man instantly.------The car is being kept at the Traffic Police Office of Tra Vinh.
